body_html:
@cy89 I have a question, how do I set rc.environment = None ?

def experiment_fn(output_dir):
    config = run_config.RunConfig(model_dir=output_dir)
    config.environment = None
    classifier = tf.estimator.DNNClassifier(hidden_units=[10, 10], feature_columns=feature_columns, n_classes=3, config=config)

    from tensorflow.contrib.learn.python.learn.utils import saved_model_export_utils

    return tflearn.Experiment(classifier,
                              train_input_fn=lambda: input_fn(train_file, perform_shuffle=True, repeat_count=10),
                              eval_input_fn=lambda: input_fn(test_file, perform_shuffle=False, repeat_count=1),
                              eval_metrics=None,
                              export_strategies=[saved_model_export_utils.make_export_strategy(
                                  serving_input_fn=json_serving_input_fn, default_output_alternative_key=None,
                                  exports_to_keep=1
                              )],
                              train_steps=100
                              )


learn_runner.run(experiment_fn=experiment_fn, output_dir='build2/')

body:
@cy89 I have a question, how do I set rc.environment = None ?

```python
def experiment_fn(output_dir):
    config = run_config.RunConfig(model_dir=output_dir)
    config.environment = None
    classifier = tf.estimator.DNNClassifier(hidden_units=[10, 10], feature_columns=feature_columns, n_classes=3, config=config)

    from tensorflow.contrib.learn.python.learn.utils import saved_model_export_utils

    return tflearn.Experiment(classifier,
                              train_input_fn=lambda: input_fn(train_file, perform_shuffle=True, repeat_count=10),
                              eval_input_fn=lambda: input_fn(test_file, perform_shuffle=False, repeat_count=1),
                              eval_metrics=None,
                              export_strategies=[saved_model_export_utils.make_export_strategy(
                                  serving_input_fn=json_serving_input_fn, default_output_alternative_key=None,
                                  exports_to_keep=1
                              )],
                              train_steps=100
                              )


learn_runner.run(experiment_fn=experiment_fn, output_dir='build2/')
```

**Exception** 
File "E:\Programs\Anaconda3\envs\tensorflow-gpu\lib\site-packages\tensorflow\contrib\learn\python\learn\learn_runner.py", line 200, in run
    experiment = experiment_fn(output_dir=output_dir)
  File "D:/PyCharm-Workspace/Tensorflow-Projects/iris/iris_github_issue.py", line 67, in experiment_fn
    config.environment = None
AttributeError: can't set attribute
